item.title: Product Management Resources Master List
item.description: On this page I will keep a list of all the resources which I find (partially) helpfull. Books: Crossing the Chasm Building products for te Enterprise: Product Management in Enterprise Software

item.title: Software Engineering Resources Master List
item.description: On this page I will keep a list of all the resources which I find (partially) helpfull. How to become a programmer Braydie’s github on how to become a programmer lists skills which are needed on how to make impact as a programmer. Designing Data Intensive Applications. This book is a must read if you want to build scalable applications.

item.title: Sample blog content 2
item.description: Sample blog content. Like a lorem ipsum but saying something more interesting. Welcome to the world of “Content Ipsum,” the fresh alternative to the classic lorem ipsum. It’s the perfect blend for designers and writers who crave a dash of creativity and meaning in their placeholder text. Imagine a text that not only fills the space but also sparks the imagination, a text that weaves tales of innovation, inspiration, and the endless possibilities that creativity brings.
